actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that, after January 1, 1974, Memorial Day be observed on May 30 of each year and Veterans' Day be observed on the 11th of November of each year.

summary.text: Provides that, after January 1, 1974, Memorial Day shall be observed on May 30 of each year and Veterans Day shall be observed on the 11th of November of each year.

titles.title: A bill to provide that, after January 1, 1974, Memorial Day be observed on May 30 of each year and Veterans' Day be observed on the 11th of November of each year.
